mapper.update: update article set title=#{saveArticleBody.title}, description=#{saveArticleBody.description}, content=#{saveArticleBody.content}, updateTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{saveArticleBody.id}
mapper.select: select a.id, title, description, content, authorId, u.name as authorName, u.avatarUrl as authorAvatarUrl, a.viewCount, a.createTime, updateTime, deleteTime from article a left join user u on a.authorId = u.id where a.id = #{getArticleInfoParams.id} and deleteTime is null;
select COUNT(*) as count from article where deleteTime is null ;
mapper.insert: insert into article_evaluate(articleId, evaluate, userId) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{evaluate}, #{userId});
insert into article_comment(articleId, authorId, content) values (#{addArticleCommentBody.articleId}, #{addArticleCommentBody.authorId}, #{addArticleCommentBody.content})
mapper.select:
select ac.id, ac.articleId, ac.authorId, u.name as authorName, u.avatarUrl as authorAvatarUrl,ac.content, ac.targetId, ac.createTime, u.createTime from article_comment ac left join user u on ac.authorId = u.id where articleId = #{getArticleCommentListParams.articleId} order by ac.createTime desc
limit #{getArticleCommentListParams.limit},#{getArticleCommentListParams.pageSize}
